nodes.text: HELLO! WHAT A LOVELY DAY IT IS. WHAT DO YOU BRING FOR ME?

choices.text: Hello! I was wondering if you would be interested in a.. wait what?

nodes.text: I DISLIKE YOUR LACK OF WHIMSY! GOOD DAY TO YOU!
YOUR PRODUCT! TELL ME MORE ABOUT IT!

choices.text: Wow you sure are... a lot! Uh, it's just a regular product.
It's a product of my own invention, the {itemName}! It will change your life forever!

nodes.text: I LOVE INNOVATION! HOW DOES IT WORK? TELL ME EVERYTHING!

choices.text: Well, you see... it kinda just does stuff. You know, the usual.
It is the most marvelous thing! You simply must have one in your life! It will bring you endless joy!

nodes.text: ABSOLUTELY! I SHALL TAKE IT WITH GREAT PLEASURE!
